none.name: none
none.desc: Choose a class to learn about them, or skip this selection if you do not intend to run a combat game. You can still generate a roleplaying character with just a name, picture, and some skill proficiencies!

archer.name: Archer
archer.desc: You can attack from far away with a bow or up close with a sword or dagger. You can be quiet and hard to find like a hunter.
archer.shortRestAbility: Aim your bow really well and add +5 to an attack roll.
archer.longRestAbility: Call an animal to fight with you for 1 minute.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.desc: You are the strongest warrior with a big sword, axe, or hammer. You are the first to run into battle to scare your enemies.
barbarian.shortRestAbility: Make an extra attack on your turn.
barbarian.longRestAbility: Charge your weapon with Fire, Ice, or Lightning. It deals +1 extra damage for 1 minute.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.desc: Your faith lets you call down light from heaven to strike the wicked. Your kindness heals your friends in battle and all those in need.
cleric.shortRestAbility: Heal someone's injuries, returning 3 lost hit points.
cleric.longRestAbility: Bless yourself and your friends for 1 minute. Everyone can add +2 to all rolls.

druid.name: Druid
druid.desc: You live in a magical forest and are friends with the plants and animals. You can use nature magic to grab enemies with vines or call an animal to attack.
druid.shortRestAbility: Trap an enemy when you Summon Thorny vines on them. They can't move on their next turn, and they take 1 damage if they try to attack.
druid.longRestAbility: Turn into a fierce animal and attack with your claws for 1 minute. Claw attacks deal +1 extra damage.

knight.name: Knight
knight.desc: You bravely protect others with your sword and shield. Enemies can't hurt your friends if they can't get past you.
knight.shortRestAbility: When you or a friend next to you gets attacked, you can use your shield to block all of the damage.
knight.longRestAbility: For 1 minute, you can add an extra +2 to your attacks rolls.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.desc: You have studied every book about magic. You can throw fire, ice, lightning, and clever magic tricks at your enemies.
wizard.shortRestAbility: Turn one enemy into a snail for 1 hour. They turn back if they take damage or if you turn someone else into a snail.
wizard.longRestAbility: Your attack blasts a big area on the map with Fire, Ice, or Lightning. Everyone in the area takes the attack damage and +1 extra damage.
